from string import *
for i in xrange(int(raw_input())):
    n,k=map(int,raw_input().split(' '))
    c=raw_input()
    s={c[0]:1}
    x=1
    l=1
    for j in xrange(1,len(c)):
        if c[j] in s.keys():
            s[c[j]]+=1
        else:
            s[c[j]]=1
        if c[j]==c[j-1]:
            l+=1
            if l>=k:
                x=0
        else:
            l=1
    if x:
        print -1
    else:
        result=1
        l=0
        for j in xrange(1,len(c)):
            if c[j]!=c[j-1]:
                result+=1
                l=0
            else:
                l+=1
                if l>=k:
                    result+=1
                    l=0
        print result
